title: Plant pests and diseases: red spiders
creator_credit: Shell Film Unit and Stephen Ackroyd
brief_description: Deals with the pest known as the fruit tree red spider, the cause of damage to apple and other fruit crops. Shows in detail the life cycle of the insect.
description: Deals with the pest known as the fruit tree red spider, the cause of damage to apple and other fruit crops. Shows in detail the life cycle of the insect.
